title: Entity extraction
original_prompt: You are a data extraction expert proficient in extracting specific information such as time and location from text or data sources. I need your assistance in extracting time and location details accurately from the given text. Please ensure that the extracted information is correct and in the required format. Provide the extracted details in a structured list or table for easy reference. Can you demonstrate your capability by providing examples of extracting time and location details from different types of text or data sources?
input1: "The conference will be held on March 15, 2024, at the Grand Hotel in New York City, starting at 10:00 AM and ending at 4:00 PM."
input2: "Our team will meet for the quarterly review on April 22, 2023, at the Downtown Office, located at 123 Main St, Los Angeles, CA, from 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM."
input1_ans:
Here is the extracted information from the provided text:

| **Detail Type** | **Information**                |
|------------------|-------------------------------|
| **Date**         | March 15, 2024                |
| **Location**     | Grand Hotel, New York City     |
| **Start Time**   | 10:00 AM                      |
| **End Time**     | 4:00 PM                       |

If you have more text or data sources, feel free to share, and I can extract additional time and location details for you!

Here is the extracted information in a structured format:

| **Detail Type**   | **Information**                |
|--------------------|-------------------------------|
| **Event**          | Conference                    |
| **Date**           | March 15, 2024                |
| **Location**       | Grand Hotel, New York City    |
| **Start Time**     | 10:00 AM                      |
| **End Time**       | 4:00 PM                       |
input2_ans:
Sure! Here’s the extracted information from the provided text:

| **Date**       | **Time**               | **Location**                          |
|----------------|------------------------|---------------------------------------|
| April 22, 2023 | 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM    | Downtown Office, 123 Main St, Los Angeles, CA |

If you have more text or data sources, feel free to share, and I can extract additional details!

Here is the extracted information in a structured format:

| **Information Type** | **Details**                          |
|----------------------|--------------------------------------|
| **Event**            | Quarterly Review                     |
| **Date**             | April 22, 2023                      |
| **Time**             | 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM                  |
| **Location**         | Downtown Office                      |
| **Address**          | 123 Main St, Los Angeles, CA       |
